text: Andreyevsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Alexandrovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 26 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 42 km from Meleuz, 14 km from Alexandrovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Andreyevsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
